Subskills.name: Divide Soul
Subskills.description: Bone spirit unleashes additional souls on hit.

Subskills.name: Purifying Essence
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by bone spirit.

Subskills.name: Ghouls of Agony
Subskills.description: No longer explodes on hit but travels forwards slowly dealing damage over time.

Subskills.name: Life Infusion
Subskills.description: Increases the explosion area of effect radius of bone spirit.

Subskills.name: Ancient Possession
Subskills.description: Bone spirits grow larger and deal more damage over time while traveling.

Subskills.name: Cycle of Life
Subskills.description: Decreases the cooldown of bone spirit.

Subskills.name: Mark Target
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt to bosses.

Subskills.name: Spirit Festival
Subskills.description: Consume multiple corpses in a radius around you summoning a bone spirit from each. Cooldown is now increased.

Subskills.name: Follow the Leader
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by bone spirits explosion.

Subskills.name: Spirits Unleashed
Subskills.description: Increases bone spirit size and damage scaling with your explosion area of effect stat.

Subskills.name: Soul infusion
Subskills.description: When passing through one of the necromancers summons or allies bone spirits heals them for a portion of their maximum life.

Subskills.name: Furnace of Souls
Subskills.description: Summon increased amount of souls inflicting burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Soul Sacrifice
Subskills.description: Now consumes a portion of your mana on hit converting it into additional damage.
